name: VoterProxy
description: VoterProxy contract. based on Convex's VoterProxy smart contract https://etherscan.io/address/0x989AEb4d175e16225E39E87d0D97A3360524AD80#code.

eventDecorators.name: DepositorChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: OperatorChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: OwnerChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: StashAccessGranted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: VotingPowerCleared
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: VotingPowerDelegated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOfPool
functionDecorators.description: Balance of gauge.

functionDecorators.name: claimBal
functionDecorators.description: Claims VeBal tokens.

functionDecorators.name: claimFees
functionDecorators.description: Claims fees.

parameterDecorators.name: _distroContract
parameterDecorators.description: The distro contract to claim from.

functionDecorators.name: claimRewards
functionDecorators.description: Claims rewards_gauge The gauge to claim from.

functionDecorators.name: clearDelegate
functionDecorators.description: Clears delegation.

functionDecorators.name: createLock
functionDecorators.description: Locks BAL tokens to veBal.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of BAL tokens to lock.

parameterDecorators.name: _unlockTime
parameterDecorators.description: Epoch time when tokens unlock, rounded down to whole weeks.

functionDecorators.name: delegateVotingPower
functionDecorators.description: Delegates voting power to EOA so that it can vote on behalf of DAO off chain (Snapshot).

parameterDecorators.name: _delegateTo
parameterDecorators.description: to whom we delegate voting power.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Used to deposit tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the LP token.

functionDecorators.name: execute
functionDecorators.description: Executes a call to `_to` with calldata `_data`.

functionDecorators.name: grantStashAccess
functionDecorators.description: Sets `_stash` access to `_status`.

functionDecorators.name: increaseAmount
functionDecorators.description: Increases amount of veBal tokens without modifying the unlock time.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of veBal tokens to increase.

functionDecorators.name: increaseTime
functionDecorators.description: Extend the unlock time.

functionDecorators.name: release
functionDecorators.description: Redeems veBal tokens. Only possible if the lock has expired.

functionDecorators.name: setDepositor
functionDecorators.description: Changes the depositor of the contract. Only the owner can change the depositor.

parameterDecorators.name: _depositor
parameterDecorators.description: The new depositor of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: setOperator
functionDecorators.description: Changes the operator of the contract. Only the owner can change the operator Current operator must be shutdown before changing the operator Or we can set operator to address(0).

parameterDecorators.name: _operator
parameterDecorators.description: The new operator of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: setOwner
functionDecorators.description: Used to change the owner of the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The new owner of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: voteMultipleGauges
functionDecorators.description: Votes for multiple gauge weights. Input arrays must have same length.

parameterDecorators.name: _weights
parameterDecorators.description: The weights for a gauge in basis points (units of 0.01%). Minimal is 0.01%. Ignored if 0.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Used for pulling extra incentive reward tokens out.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Used for withdrawing tokens. If this contract doesn't have enough tokens it will withdraw them from gauge.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens to withdraw.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawAll
functionDecorators.description: Used for withdrawing tokens. If this contract doesn't have enough tokens it will withdraw them from gauge.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawWethBal
functionDecorators.description: Used for withdrawing wethBal tokens to address. If contract doesn't have asked _amount tokens it will withdraw all tokens.
